sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Footer = () => { return (

CyberSecurity Training Platform

Empowering government employees with cybersecurity awareness through realistic simulations and interactive training.

Quick Links

  • Home
  • Simulations
  • Quiz
  • Dashboard

Contact

IT Security Helpdesk

Email: security-support@example.gov

Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567

Support portal: support.example.gov

Support hours: Mon–Fri, 09:00–17:00 (local time). For suspected phishing, do not click links — report the message to the Security Helpdesk immediately.

© {new Date().getFullYear()} CyberSecurity Training Platform. All rights reserved.

); }; export default Footer;
